parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Containers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add backpack(s) to the cargo space of vehicle. Classname list of available backpacks is [[Arma 2 OA: Backpacks|here]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>In Arma 3, arguments for this command are local (<template><title>Icon</title><part><name index="1"/><value>localArgument</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>32</value></part></template>). For global variant see [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]]</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>vehicle [[addBackpackCargo]] [backpackClassName, count]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle to add the backpack to

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [backpackClassName, count]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> backpackClassName: [[String]] - backpack classname

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] - number of backpacks to add.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[Magic Variables#this_2|this]] [[addBackpackCargo]] ["TK_RPG_Backpack_EP1", 2];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_apc [[addBackpackCargo]] ["US_Patrol_Pack_EP1", 4];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[backpackContainer]], [[firstBackpack]], [[unitBackpack]], [[backpack]], [[backpackCargo]], [[getBackpackCargo]], [[backpackItems]], [[addBackpack]], [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[removeBackpack]], [[clearBackpackCargo]], [[clearBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[clearAllItemsFromBackpack]], [[loadBackpack]], [[backpackSpaceFor]], [[canAddItemToBackpack]], [[addItemToBackpack]], [[removeItemFromBackpack]], [[everyBackpack]]
</value></part></template>
